For the baseline period 1986–2005, we used the datasets of daily precipitation and air temperature available at 0.25° resolution from the Meteorological Archival and Retrieval System (MARS), which is the main repository of meteorological data at the European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts (ECMWF)
40 . To ensure a wide coverage while keeping the number of cases to a reasonable level, 15 sites (Fig. 1) were selected purposely from rice-growing areas.
